original_title: Almost - 5 Incher, Almost a Skateboard Video
overview: Almost Skateboards was started in 2003 by Rodney Mullen and Daewon Song after both had ceased participating in their previous companies, Enjoi and Artafact, respectively. Almost Skateboards manufactures skateboard decks using 7-ply, 8-ply and carbon fiber constructions.
title: 5 Incher, Almost a Skateboard Video
